import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuth } from "../../context/auth"; import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Main() { const [auth , setAuth] = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () =>{ setAuth({user: null, token : "", refreshToken : "" }); localStorage.removeItem("auth"); navigate('/login'); } const LoginIn = auth.user !== null && auth.token !== "" && auth. return (
